ComicInfo.Summary:
First issue of the new fortnightly Judge Dredd The Megazine - come with free badge taped to the cover - 'I do it fortnightly in Judge Dredd the Megazine'.
Cover: Sean Phillips/Colin Macneil (Judge Dredd)
